title: Super Spacious 3bd/1BATH w/ Laundry + Off-Street Parking
posting_body: Beautifully Maintained 3 Bedroom Apartments in Dorchester
*Amenities: Spacious layout, Great Sized bedrooms, Hardwood floors, Brand New Bathroom, Coin-up Laundry in Building, a Spacious Pantry and a Huge Outdoor Space!!
Please mention reference #3401 to inquire about the apartment in this ad!
Finding an affordable apartment in Boston can be time consuming and quite frustrating.
Responding to ad after ad and dealing with unprofessional people.
I specialize in working with renters because I understand how frustrating the moving process is, especially here in Boston
It is extra gratifying to help a fellow renter have an easy and pleasant experience finding a new home.
I have full access to all listings on the market and I can seriously help you find a great apartment.
Call or send me an email and let's get to work on finding you the perfect place!
You can google my name and read the great reviews my clients have written about me.
Here are just a few of the nice things they've had to say about my services:
My housemate and I were fortunate to work with Nayaris (Naya) and witness her skills, patience, assertiveness, and advocacy for us as tenants.
We had contacted three other brokers/realtors (one or two from very large agencies) about viewing the unit, and Naya was the only person to follow up and get us a viewing.
Having rented in Boston for almost 8 years, I can truly say Naya has been the best broker/realtor who I’ve worked with.
Naya communicated with us through email, text, and phone call and was reasonably responsive.
I appreciated that Naya would email us with updates and details, and let us know when she would be available.
She drove back and forth from our old place to pick up and deliver paperwork which was totally beyond expectations and made our lives much easier!
Naya was in communication with the owners and their rep, relayed us only the relevant information to us, and relentlessly advocated for us -- even when we weren't prepared to advocate for ourselves.
During a really tough year, and with me unemployed due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the rental and lease process was longer than average and required more paperwork.
Naya handled all of this with ease and provided us with reassurance along the way.
We are immensely grateful and have been enjoying our new home, which couldn’t have happened without Naya!**
